p: Bottles, dosing spoons, or glasses used to feed infants with breast milk have to be sterilized ( 52) . A multi-center retrospective study conducted in Italy addressing 42 women, recommend physicians and midwives, working in regions with high contamination rates by COVID-19, to encourage women to wear face masks, both during labor and childbirth and when providing care to infants and breastfeeding, aiming to decrease transmission to NB, considering that individuals with the infection may be asymptomatic ( 47) .
